name: Blythest.github.io
body:
**Skills**
Ruby, Python, Flask, JavaScript, D3.js, Unix, Bash Scripting, HTML and CSS, Git, Processing

**Experience**
**Data Infrastructure Engineer at Ulive, July 2014 — Present**
Build and maintain data wrangling and monitoring systems that respond to conditions affecting Scripps Networks Interactive’s ad-supported, video syndication services.
Focused on data ingestion and streaming analytics: automation tools for log rotation and node stability; dashboards, chatroom plugins, and other visuals for wider company use. 

**Software Engineering Fellow at Hackbright Academy, February 2014 — April 2014**
Developed a network and host scanner using Python and NMAP.
Analyzed network topology by war-dialing local subnet.
Visualized network using D3.js’s force layout.

**Jr. Developer at Tanooki Labs, October 2013 — January 2014**
Created WhoDoo, an internal scheduling tool in Ruby on Rails as a training project.

**Internship at Visual Data Lab, Bloomberg LP, September 2012 — January 2013**
Contributed research and design for fiscal cliff and European debt crisis products.
User-tested feature for Bloomberg reporters to add comments directly to State-by-State, a product that graphs historic US economic data.

**Research Fellow at Project Projects, June 2012 — August 2012**
Researched the technical and cultural possibilities for museum collection data.
Project Projects is an interactive, print, and exhibition design studio that primarily works with arts and architecture clients.

**Internship at New York Times R&D Lab, June 2011 — December 2011**
Constructed wireframes and user flows for an experimental Semantic-Web-based application for browser, iPad, and Microsoft Surface.
Presented designs to R&D staff, masthead editors, and Times technologists in weekly meeting.

**Writer at New York Magazine, V Magazine, ArtNews, style.com, therumpus.net (among others)**
December 2007 — May 2010

**Freelance Researcher at Vanity Fair, Vogue, Cookie**
March 2007 — November 2009

**Education**
**New York University**
M.P.S, Interactive Telecommunications, 2010 - 2013

**Columbia University in the City of New York**
Bachelor's Degree, Honors in Anthropology, 2002 - 2006

**School of Visual Arts**
Data Visualization Intensive, Summer 2012
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
